name: Look For
description:
Hello! So, this game is my first solo game made in 3 days. It's free, but if you would like you can support me) 

What you should do?
Let me start from strange red geometric enemies, that want to caught you and make you play this game forever! But there is a way out of this strange world you are "Looking For", got it? That's game name :D not so original name, but is not so bad.

Use 3 abilities: smoke bomb, dash, disguise. That will help you to hide and find the exit.

Oh, and one more thing. I hidden in game 5 easter eggs. Hope you'll get all of them.

Don't be sick, have fun and be happy)

Kostya)
